articles.title: Mice Discovered Giving ‘First Aid’ to Unconscious Mates in Surprising Display of Empathy - Good News Network
articles.description: When presented with an unresponsive acquaintance, a mouse may attempt to revive them by pawing and gently biting at their face, scientists recently reported. A third behavior was also seen, however, and that involved the attendant mouse removing the unconscio…
